title: Pak citizen detained in Guantanamo Bay returns home: FO
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 29 (APP): Saif Ullah Paracha, a Pakistani national, who had been detained in Guantanamo Bay,  arrived home on Saturday after his release, the Foreign Office Spokesperson said.
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs completed an extensive inter-agency process to facilitate the repatriation of Paracha.
“We are glad that a Pakistani citizen detained abroad is finally reunited with his family,” the spokesperson said in a press release.
